EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Program Owner when Program Approver approves the Amendment
EmailTemplate.name: Program Amendment Approved Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Program #{!Program__c.Name} Amendment has been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Program__c.OwnerFirstName},
This email is to notify you that the Amendment has been approved for the Program # {!Program__c.Name}. To view the program details, Kindly login to the EGMS Systems and click here to open record.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
